mean_cn: adj. 喧闹的，难控制的，粗暴的，骚乱的
mean_en: uncontrolled in a way that is playful or full of energy
word_etyma: ram =branch（枝）+ buncti撞+ ous形容词词缀 → adj. 难控制的；喧闹的；粗暴的；骚乱的
short_phrase: a bunch of rambunctious kids playing
sentence: Our kids are rather rambunctious - always running around getting into mischief.
sentence_trans: 我们的孩子们相当喧闹，总是跑来跑去、调皮捣蛋。
